about_the_game:
Choose your Queen and King and assemble a deck of formidable cards, each representing unique units and spells. Unleash the magic powers of chess pieces to overcome your foes and claim victory. Master the art of deckbuilding as you customize your strategies and discover synergies that will turn the tide of battle in your favor.

Harness the unique abilities of your chess-inspired units, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Position your pieces strategically on the board, exploit tactical advantages, and execute devastating combos to dismantle your opponent's defenses. Adapt your strategy on the fly as the board state evolves, utilizing special abilities and outmaneuvering your rivals with cunning tactics.

Key Features:

  • Unique fusion of card-based strategy and chess-inspired gameplay.
  • Unleash the unknown powers of the Universe with powerful cards.
  • Thrilling online multiplayer battles.
  • Customizable deckbuilding and strategic depth.
  • Stylized visuals, immersive environments, and captivating lore.

short_description: Embark on an epic journey where chess meets magic and digital card games in Chelesste! Engage in battles on a mystical chessboard as you command powerful cards. Strategize and outwit your opponents in this thrilling blend of strategy, card gameplay, and chess-inspired tactics.
